actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development

official_title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include additional counties in the State of Mississippi as part of the Appalachian region.

summary.text: Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include Carroll, Grenada, and Montgomery Counties in Mississippi as part of the Appalachian region for purposes of such Act.

titles.title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include additional counties in the State of Mississippi as part of the Appalachian region.
